column2: "Iyinom ekyir no metsee biribi tse dɛ nyimpadodow ndze kɛse wɔ sor dɛ
column5: nye tum yɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn dze:"

column2: "osiandɛ n'atsɛmbu yɛ nokwar na ɔtsen; na oebu edwaman kɛse no a ɔdze no ndwamanyɛ asɛɛ asaase no atsɛn
column3: na oedzi no nkowaa bɔgyaa ho wer wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Na wɔsee bio dɛ
column3: Alleluia! Na no wusiw fow sor mbersantsen mfesantsen."

column2: "Na mpanyimfo eduonu anan no nye atseasefo baanan no hwee ase kotoow Nyankopɔn a ɔtse ahengua no no do no dɛ
"Na ndze bi fi ahengua no no mu see dɛ
column4: hom a hom yɛ no nkowaa
column5: nye hom a hom suro no nyina

column2: "Na metsee biribi dɛ nyimpadodow kɛse ndze
column4: nye asenaman pii a ɔyɛ dzen ndze

column2: "Hom mma yendzi dɛw na hɛn enyi ngye mbordo
column4: na Eguambaa no n'ayeforhyia no edu

column2: "Na wɔdze ndwera fɛɛfɛw a ɔhoa fitaa maa no dɛ omfura: na ndwera fɛɛfɛw no nye ahotseweefo no ndzeyɛtsenenee."
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column4: Nhyira nye hɔn a woehyia hɔn Eguambaa no n'ayeforase. Na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: Iyinom yɛ Nyankopɔn nsɛm a ɔyɛ nokwar."

column2: "Na mohwee ase wɔ n'ananadze dɛ morokotow no. Na ɔsee me dɛ
column4: mma nnyɛ dɛm: meyɛ w'ewurakowaa nye wo nuanom a wokitsa Jesus dasedzi mu no bi. Kotow Nyankopɔn: na Jesus dasedzi nye nkɔnhyɛ sunsum no."

column2: "Na muhun dɛ sor ebue; na hwɛ
column4: na nyia ɔtse no do no
column5: wɔfrɛ no Kantamanto nye Nokwafo; na obu atsɛn na odzi ako wɔ nokwar mu."

column2: "Na n'enyiwa tse dɛ gyaframee
column4: na wɔakyerɛw ne dzin bi a obiara nnyim dɛ ɔno nko

column2: "na ɔhyɛ atar bi a wɔdze abɔ bɔgya mu: na ne dzin dze Nyankopɔn Asɛm."
"Na dɔm a wɔwɔ sor tsetse mpɔnkɔ efufuw do dzi n'ekyir
column3: hyehyɛ ndwera pa a ɔhoa fitaa."

column2: "Na afona ndam ndam fi n'anomu pue a ɔdze rubotwitwa amanaman: na ɔdze dadze poma bɔhwɛ hɔn do: na ɔno na otsiatsia Nyankopɔn
column3: adze nyina do Tumfo no n'ebufuhyew wenyintwer no do."

column2: "Na ɔwɔ dzin bi a wɔakyerɛw no ne ntar do nye n'aserɛ do dɛ
"Na muhun ɔbɔfo baako a ogyina ewia mu; na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu see nnoma a wotu nam sor finimfin no nyina dɛ
column3: Hom mbra mbehyia Nyankopɔn edzidzi kɛse no ase;"

column2: "na hom mbedzi ahemfo nam
column5: nye mpɔnkɔ nye hɔn a wɔtsetse do hɔn nam

column2: "Na muhun dɛ abowa no
column5: aboaboa hɔn ano dɛ wɔnye nyia ɔtse ɔpɔnkɔ no do nye no dɔm ribedzi ako."

column2: "Na wɔkyeer abowa no
column3: nye nkɔnhyɛnyi torfo no a ɔyɛɛ n'enyim nsɛnkyerɛdze dze daadaa hɔn a wɔgyee abowa no ne nsewhyɛ no
column4: nye hɔn a wɔkotoow no honyi: na wɔtoow hɔn beenu enyimon guu ogya nsutaae a sɔɔfee dzɛw mu no mu:"

column2: "na nkaa no wɔdze nyia ɔtse pɔnkɔ no do n'afona a ofi n'anomu no kunkum hɔn
column3: na nnoma no nyina dzii hɔn nam mee."
